mrbles.kinetics¶

Kinetics Classes and Functions¶

This file stores the kinetics classes and functions for the MRBLEs Analysis module.

Classes

GlobalFit() Global non-linear regression.
KModelSim(c_substrate, c_complex, kd_init[, tol]) Kurt’s white paper for competive binding.
